name: baby shooting
description:
Dear Forest Folks !

We came across a cute baby. We need to rescue it and bring it back to its cradle.

But the path to the cradle is long and filled with traps, we need to .... shoot and pass the baby!

Get, pass and shoot the baby to the cradle but KEEP IT ALIVE at all costs.


GAMEPLAY

Bring the baby to the cradle

You can switch partners

You can throw the baby between partners

But the baby must never hit the ground

If are stuck press P to pause or R to restart level

CONTROLS KEYBOARD

- Arrows left-right to move or aim

- spacebar to jump

- Tab to change forest folk

- right shift to throw, you can control the baby while the direction of the shoot while the shift key is pressed

CONTROLS JOYSTICK

- left joystick to move or aim

- cross to jump

- L1/LS to change forest folk

- R2/RT to shoot
